title: Learn how to make a sunburst mirror centerpiece in just 4 steps
text:
Jul 29, 2015, 03.00 PM IST | Source: Indiaproperty.com Learn how to make a sunburst mirror centerpiece in just 4 steps Learn how to make a sunburst mirror centerpiece in just 4 steps   Learn how to make a sunburst mirror centerpiece in just 4 steps Learn how to make a sunburst mirror centerpiece in just 4 steps   
D o you have that one corner in the house that needs a centerpiece? Or a wall that needs some wow factor? Well we have just found the right furniture piece for you. Itâ€™s classy, edgy and is surely going to make your living room much more inviting. We are not asking you to go to the nearest furniture store or log on to a website that offers you all kinds of contemporary furnishings, rather we teach you how to make one. It will not only be light on your pocket, it will also give your room a much needed face lift. 
Materials needed 
Wooden shims Floral rings Hot glue Mirror Spray paint Clear varnish 
Method 
Step 1 

Line your working area with a rug or a plastic sheet. Now glue 2 floral rings (smaller one over the bigger one) and secure it with four wooden shims. Once your centre has been secured well, start laying all the wooden shims around the floral rings. 
Step 2 
Once you are happy with its placement, stick the wooden shims to the floral ring using some hot glue. Ensure you apply some pressure on the sticks after you have pasted them onto the ring. After you have stuck all the shims, set them aside to dry. After they have dried, spray paint them. You could also cover the shims with some dark varnish and you will have a burnt effect. 
Step 3 
You could stop right there or go a step further and create a more dramatic effect by add another layer of wooden shims in between every (earlier placed) wooden shims. But remember, the second layered shims have to be shorter than the first layer and they need to be placed between two shims. 
To give the piece some depth, paint these shims a bit lighter and finish the mirror off by adding a coat of clear varnish. 
Step 4 
Now place a round mirror right in the center and secure it by using some hot strong glue or silicon glue. Now your custom made sun burst mirror centerpiece is ready to adorn your wall. If you have white walls, you will love the contrast! 
Nidhi C Thacker for IndiaProperty.com
